name: NuGetInstaller
description: Installs and updates missing NuGet packages
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Path to Solution
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the Visual Studio Solution file

inputs.name: excludeVersion
inputs.label: Exclude Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Makes NuGet exclude package version from package folder names. Equivilent to the -ExcludeVersion NuGet.exe command line argument

inputs.name: noCache
inputs.label: Disable local cache
inputs.helpMarkDown: Equivalent to the -NoCache NuGet.exe commanline argument

inputs.name: nuGetRestoreArgs
inputs.label: NuGet Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to NuGet.exe restore.

inputs.name: nuGetPath
inputs.label: Path to NuGet.exe
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to NuGet.exe
